lead_paragraph: The food and beverage giant Nestlé terminated its sponsorship of programs by the International Association of Athletics Federations.
snippet: The food and beverage giant Nestlé terminated its sponsorship of programs by the International Association of Athletics Federations.
abstract: Nestle, citing concerns about image of their brand, pulls sponsorship of International Assn of Athletics Federations programs, which are embroiled in track and field doping scandal, other track and field news noted.
